definition: to provide for/to keep (animals, a family etc)/to raise animals/to feed and clothe/support/the necessities of life/to give birth
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: The man has a large family to support.
sentences.chinese: 這個人要養活一大家子人。

sentences.english: It has sustained them for generations, providing everything they need to survive.
sentences.chinese: 祂世世代代養活着他們，賜予他們生存所必須的一切。

sentences.english: Mehlman said it is average Americans who pay the bill for illegal immigrants.
sentences.chinese: 梅爾曼表示，是普通的美國人在養活那些非法移民。

sentences.english: His meager wage is not enough to support their five children.
sentences.chinese: 靠他一個人的微薄工資不足以養活他們的五個孩子。

sentences.english: I pity anyone who has to feed a family on such a low income.
sentences.chinese: 我憐憫任何必要以如此菲薄的收益養活百口的人。

sentences.english: He had a big family to feed.
sentences.chinese: 他還有一大家子人要養活，他不可能走開啊。

sentences.english: He sponged off his family for many years.
sentences.chinese: 多年以來他一直靠着父母養活。

sentences.english: Who earns his living without doing a day's work?
sentences.chinese: 誰白天不幹活卻能養活自己？

sentences.english: Side of the water is not only to feed the one who brought prosperity back to town.
sentences.chinese: 這一方水不僅養活了一方人，還給小鎮帶來了繁榮。

sentences.english: It also means students can work and support themselves more easily around their learning.
sentences.chinese: 這還意味着學生更容易在學習之餘去打工養活自己。

sentences.english: His wages are adequate to support three people.
sentences.chinese: 他的工資夠養活三口人。

sentences.english: So then, don't be afraid.  I will provide for you and your children.
sentences.chinese: 現在你們不要害怕，我必養活你們和你們的婦人孩子。

sentences.english: By doing this, they believe the child could survive and be grow up sound and happy.
sentences.chinese: 他們相信只有說壞話，才能夠養活這個小孩。

sentences.english: My home has the eight people person, whole is feed by a person of my father.
sentences.chinese: 我家裏有八口人，全靠我爸爸一個人養活。

sentences.english: But you can't feed her, who's to blame.
sentences.chinese: 可你養活不起，這怪誰呢？

sentences.english: She prostituted herself in order to support her children.
sentences.chinese: 她爲養活子女而操皮肉生涯。
